text: You are part of the Piltover, a symbiotic human alien empire developed centuries ago. This takes place after the exhiling of the Zaun, the untrustworthy alien race that once fought the Piltover for a hybrid empire.
You are Haoyue, the novoice commander of a starship fleet. You have been called in, there is an impending invasion, your time has come.
An inspiring scientist, your long time friend, your most appreciated second hand.
Another fleet commander, that you've met since your time in the academy. Clever, and at times fierce
A well established and leading Piltover scientist, pompous, but not too much.
And then there's you: trying to accomplish great things, yet lacking the motivation to do so at times.
